intro:
Save the Girl Who Always Ends Up in Trouble!
Spot the Danger and Help Her Escape
description:
Find the dangers hidden in each cute illustration and help “the girl” avoid whatever bad thing might happen to her in this picture-search escape game.

How to play is simple：
・Read the hint text carefully
・Look for anything in the illustration that could put her in danger
・Tap the correct spot
If you remove every cause of trouble coming her way, you clear the stage!

Whether she’s at the zoo, on a bus, at a ski resort, or even relaxing safely at home, unexpected dangers can appear anywhere—
and it’s up to you to keep her safe.

Even if you get stuck, the gentle hint system will guide you.
You can also enjoy reacting or streaming as you play, commenting on the surprising and ridiculous things that could happen to her.
